name: Juyeon Jo
content: Juyeon Jo Juyeon Jo Juyeon Jo, Ph.D. Brief Bio Teaching Research Juyeon Jo, Ph.D. Associate Professor Information Assurance Concentration Coordinator CyberSecurity Center at UNLV Department of Computer Science Howard R. Hughes College of Engineering University of Nevada, Las Vegas Las Vegas, NV 89154-4019 Email: Juyeon.Jo at unlv.edu Phone: (702) 895-5873 Office: SEB 4214 Recent News Media Coverage “UNLV Cybersecurity Leaders Help You Avoid Falling for Tricks This Halloween Season“, IT News Center, Oct. 22, 2019 Interviewed for “Quick Take: UNLV Earns Federal Designation for Cyber Defense Education“, UNLV News Center, July 31, 2019 Featured on “UNLV Engineering Faculty Hosting Second Annual GenCyber Summer Camp“, UNLV Engineering News Center, June 5, 2019 Interviewed for “CS Professor Talks to 8NewsNow about GenCyber Summer Camp“, Las Vegas News Channel 8, July 24, 2018 Featured on “Local Students Tackle Digital Crime In First-Ever UNLV GenCyber Camp“, UNLV Engineering News Center, July 26, 2018 This page is located on the Faculty Web Server Faculty Directory
